channel.description: Recent content in media on [::1] yearl.us

item.title: Openmediavault 4 server... PSU died
item.description: Oh, the sadness. Oh, the heartbreak. Never mind, stiff upper lip and all that, and remembering that I got the thing from the dump (sans disk and RAM) over a 18 months ago, it has not had a bad run. Aaand just in case I come across a PSU and get her running again, she was: Old OMV4 box DELL Inspiron 545 Serial: 839DK4J Model: DCMF Reg Type: 09040 Printed on mobo: DG33M06 SE0709

item.title: Audacity is already running... ps -ef | grep aud says nada
item.description: Machine crashed– well, hung– after [insert reason]. Age? PS showed nothing, neither did “Activity Monitor”, and my googlefu must have been for /ʃaɪt/, since I found nothing there either. After some digging around the usual directories… a lock file. Kill that, and we’re back in business. [caption id=“attachment_1460” align=“aligncenter” width=“300”] audacity-the-second-running[/caption]
